thread.title: Hannity Asks Kellyanne Conway If WH Relationship with Press Will ‘Change Dramatically’
thread.title_full: Hannity Asks Kellyanne Conway If WH Relationship with Press Will ‘Change Dramatically’ | Mediaite

author: mediaite
title: Hannity Asks Kellyanne Conway If WH Relationship with Press Will ‘Change Dramatically’

organizations.name: hannity asks kellyanne conway if wh relationship

text:
Please enable Javascript to watch. Sean Hannity interviewed Kellyanne Conway in the White House today and they talked quite a bit about media bias.
Conway said it would be nice for people to “show respect for the office” and revisited her big showdown with Chuck Todd yesterday , telling Hannity her “alternative facts” like was made into a soundbite to suit the liberal media’s purposes and expressing she didn’t care for being “ridiculed.”
Hannity told her that when she said “alternative facts,” it was clear she meant “different perspective.” And then he asked this:
“If it continues to be hostile and fake news reports continue to go out, is there a possibility that things will change dramatically? And maybe those people that colluded with Hillary, that we learned in the campaign, maybe don’t deserve the access, ’cause they’re not living up to what they’re supposed to do.”
Conway said she wants a free press and just wants the media to be more fair and not engage in “presumptive negativity,” citing that false MLK bust removal story.
Watch above, via Fox News.
